506120.name: Sol Trader Soundtrack
506120.description:
Listen to the original soundtrack created especially for Sol Trader by Andy Dollerson:

  • Join The Adventure (2:31)
  • Solar Flares (3:12)
  • A Lonely Journey (2:30)
  • The Unending Voyage (2:50)
  • Ships On Approach (1:28)
  • Far From Home (2:43)
  • Unknown Discoveries (2:20)
  • Earth In Sight (0:57)
  • Welcome Home (1:19)
  • Main Theme (1:08)

How to install


Follow these steps to access the soundtrack after you have purchased it:

  • Wait for the game to update.
  • Then right click on Sol Trader in your Library, and choose Properties
  • Choose the third tab "Local Files"
  • Click "Browse Local Files" to open your local installation folder.
  • The soundtrack will have been saved in a file called "soundtrack.zip" in this folder.
506120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
